Posts.Content: I've had many biopsies. The first was over 30 years ago and luckily all have been benign. I have a marker that was implanted 10 years ago and haven't had any issues with it I also never had any problems with any of my biopsies afterwards.
Posts.Signature: 87(now 88!)yr old Dad diagnosed 7/12 w NSC squamous lung cancer w small lymph node involved,1 large tumor 4 CM & some small. Stage 3 Phase 1 :Chemo 7/12 -6 wks Carboplatin/Taxol Hospitalized 4 days after first chemo. Concurrent Radiation-every day M-F Scan Oct 24- large tumor shrunk ,small gone. Phase 2:chemo started first week Nov. Allergic reaction,chemo changed. Just Taxol. 3 weeks on/1 off. Finished 4 rounds.(12) 2/7/13 now 2 mo off & then a Pet scan. 4/10/13 pet scan :Good results - tumor granulized or something. 7/10/13 CT scan shows no negative changes ! 3 months off with intermittent bloodwork then Pet scan end of Oct. Oct scan showed an area near original tumor which they'd like to keep an eye on so scheduled scan in Dec. Brain CT and Brain MRI . No mets. Next scan March 22. Pet scan base of skull to thigh. Results- no negative changes! He died 4/10/14 from dementia . Go dad go!!

Posts.Title: Stereotactic Biopsy Question

Posts.Content: Please don't be terribly worried until she has a biopsy. In the last 25 or so years I've had numerous biopsies and ( knock on wood) all have been benign. They did place a "BB" in my breast several years ago so they could keep an eye on a specific area.

Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Biopsy?

Posts.Content: Sorry you're having to go through this ... I have had at least 8 biopsies and at least 30 mammos. It's always thank God been benign. I think the dr may not think its a cyst by how it feels to him but that's why he wants the scans. Try to remain calm until you're seen and if a biopsy is required . They placed a "BB" or little pellet in one area of concern 6 years ago . Then when they mammo each year they know where they took tissue out. They're basically waiting and seeing if it ever changes. Hope this helps. You take care and be positive !
